thread.title: Simplifile Announces E-recording in Putnam County
thread.title_full: Simplifile Announces E-recording in Putnam County

author: PRWEB
title: Simplifile Announces E-recording in Putnam County
text:
E-recording will now allow a document to be submitted for recording over a secure connection with the recording office. PUTNAM COUNTY, Fla. (PRWEB) July 06, 2015
Putnam County, Fla., has implemented electronic recording of documents through Simplifile, the nation’s largest e-recording service, giving customers a secure, online recording option.
“The Putnam County Clerk of Courts office is continuing to offer access to our office by using the latest technology,” said Putnam County Clerk of Courts Tim Smith. “E-recording will now allow a document to be submitted for recording over a secure connection with the recording office. Simplifile will allow the filer to submit the document and will accept the payment of recording fees without the need to visit our office. This service is available to the business community along with the public.”
Using Simplifile’s secure, web-based service, customers ranging from title companies to banks, attorneys, and lien filers, will have the ability to scan or upload and submit documents such as land records directly to the recording office and have them stamped, recorded, and returned in minutes.
“Our experience with Simplifile has been excellent so far,” said Melanie Bryan, recording supervisor at Putnam County. “We’ve received great support from the folks at Simplifile in getting us ready for the live production. We are accepting all general real estate documents such as deeds , mortgages, releases, assignments, affidavits, and other documents that are commonly recorded in the Official Record.”
Fewer payment errors, stamps, mailing expenses, and less overall paper waste are also some of the benefits that come with e-recording.
“E-recording has without question become the preferred method for submitting public land documents and records for recording nationwide, and we are thrilled to be providing this service for Putnam County and their customers,” said Paul Clifford, president of Simplifile.
With the addition of Putnam County, there are now 44 counties in the state of Florida that have adopted e-recording with Simplifile. Nationwide, more than 1,250 counties also e-record with Simplifile.
High-speed Internet access, a PC, and a scanner are the minimum requirements for customers to begin e-recording with Simplifile.
For more information about e-recording in Putnam County , call 800-460-5657 or visit simplifile.com.
About Simplifile
Simplifile is a rapidly-growing, online service that connects lenders, settlement agents, and counties. Since 2000, Simplifile has grown the nation’s largest e-recording network, which has transformed the title and real estate industry. From e-recording to document sharing, collaboration, and post closing, Simplifile offers an array of services in one place to help users securely record, share, and track documents, data, and fees with ease. To learn more, visit simplifile.com or call 800-460-5657.
